channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: WATCH: Polar bear mom adopts cub during migration

item.title: LIVE: ABC News Live
item.description: 24/7 coverage of breaking news and live events

item.title: WATCH: Oscars reveal 2026 shortlist
item.description: Ahead of nominations in January, The Academy Awards revealed the list of top movies set to be in the running for the 98th Oscars.

item.title: Jared Isaacman confirmed to be NASA administrator after second nomination
item.description: President Trump withdrew Isaacman's nomination in April, before reissuing​ it again in November.

item.title: Rob and Michele Reiner's children speak out after Nick Reiner's arrest
item.description: Jake and Romy Reiner, the children of renowned Hollywood director Rob Reiner and wife Michele Singer Reiner, are speaking out for the first time.

item.title: Nick Reiner appears in court, arraignment set for Jan. 7 in killing of parents
item.description: Nick Reiner​ appeared in court on Wednesday on two counts of murder in the killing of his parents, Rob Reiner and Michele Singer Reiner.
